sense.def: Pathological Condition Abbreviated Designation of tan huan 癱瘓② , paralysis. If a tan huan 癱瘓 , paralysis, affects one’s right side, the abbreviation is huan 瘓 . Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 1: 乳香應痛丸，治一切 風氣，左癱右瘓，口眼喎斜，半身不遂，語言謇澀 , “The ‘pills with ru xiang that respond to pain’ cure all types of wind qi, left side paralysis, right side paralysis , with mouth and eyes assuming an awry position, and one half of the body not following one’s will. The [patient’s] language is hampered”.
